channel.title: 2 Questions for Matrix 718
channel.description:
Q.1: How i can make player get Dungeoneering XP from PK? Q.2: How i can make Item use on item? (Example: Bandos Hilt use on Blade to make Bandos Godsword)
Skype: Evil.Wrecked (Add me or Leave Skype name)
